errors:
Unexpected error: Page.goto: Timeout 30000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - navigating to "https://example.com/", waiting until "networkidle"

craft_bugs.title: Extended Wait Time Without Feedback
craft_bugs.user_impact: Users may feel uncertain about the progress of their task, leading to frustration or abandonment of the task.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Implement a progress indicator or animation to inform users that their task is being processed.

craft_bugs.title: Lack of Cancel Option During Wait
craft_bugs.user_impact: Users might feel trapped in the wait without an option to cancel if they change their mind or need to correct a mistake.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Provide a 'Cancel' button that allows users to stop the process and return to the previous step if needed.

craft_bugs.title: No Explanation for Long Wait Time
craft_bugs.user_impact: Users may not understand why the wait time is as long as it is, leading to confusion and potential distrust in the system.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Offer a brief explanation or tip during the wait time to educate users about why this process takes time.

craft_bugs.title: Limited visual feedback on link interaction
craft_bugs.user_impact: Users may not realize they have successfully clicked a link, leading to potential confusion or repeated clicks.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Add hover and active states to the link with distinct styles to provide clear visual feedback.

craft_bugs.title: Text might be hard to read on small devices
craft_bugs.user_impact: Users on small devices may find the text hard to read due to lack of responsive text sizing, leading to a poor reading experience.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Implement responsive typography that adjusts the font size based on the viewport size.

craft_bugs.title: Poor contrast between background and text
craft_bugs.user_impact: Some users, especially those with visual impairments, might find it difficult to read the text due to insufficient contrast.
craft_bugs.recommended_fix: Increase the contrast between the text and background colors to meet WCAG AA standards.
